text:
="preserve">Lucy Jo-Hudson (born 4 May 1983) is an English actress, known for her roles as Katy Harris in Coronation Street, Donna-Marie Quinn in Hollyoaks, Rosie Trevanion in Wild at Heart, and Rhiannon Davis in Doctors in 2016 earned her the British Soap Award for Villain of the Year in 2017.
She was born in Leeds, West Yorkshire. Her best friend Alan Halsall in the soap opera Coronation Street (2003-present)
